page.title: 17Vandalism
page.content: The survey was undertaken by a 14year old pupil who covered every street in Cilfynydd looking for evidence of vandalism to property.There was visible vandalism,such as broken windows etc.The two telephone kiosks had been defaced by graffiti as had the bus shelters.Vandalism was evident on the school and street signs Graffiti was seen on every lampost,litter bins and walls.Benches had also been attacked which resulted in them being damaged and defaced,litter was everywhere in the streets which are most widely used by shopkeepers.Generally there was a good deal of evidence of mindless vandalism and graffiti but a lesser ammount of vandalism.
